channel.title: Have role cards accessible in client before games
channel.description: I have only found a way to access what roles do what in the client once a game had already started. That info should be visible as you wait in the lobby to help acquaint new players with all the roles.

item.title: Have role cards accessible in client before games
item.dc:creator: jonahbaskin
item.description:
I have only found a way to access what roles do what in the client once a game had already started. That info should be visible as you wait in the lobby to help acquaint new players with all the roles.
